practiceAreas: Personal Injury|Land Use & Zoning Law|Wills & Trusts|Civil Litigation|Commercial Real Estate Litigation|Criminal Defense|Real Estate Litigation|Commercial Litigation|Probate Litigation|Condominium Law|Insurance Claims|Will Contests|Auto Accidents
description:
Located in Saugus, Massachusetts, The Chapdelaine Law Office has served the needs of residents and businesses throughout the Greater Boston metro region and Eastern Massachusetts since 2005.

During that time, the attorneys at our law firm have achieved unprecedented success delivering the unmatched representation and reliable counsel our clients need for their most serious and important legal issues regarding any of the following practice areas:

  • Personal injury
  • Criminal defense
  • Business litigation
  • Consumer protection
  • Civil litigation
  • Condominium association law
  • Land use and zoning
  • Commercial and residential real estate law and transactions
  • Wills, trusts and estate planning
  • Estate and trust administration and probate

As skilled litigators, we have helped hundreds of clients protect their rights and interests in the face of complex and challenging legal disputes, and we have a long record securing favorable verdicts and settlements for those we serve.

Delivering the personalized attention you deserve, we will work closely with you to fully understand your situation so that we can devise an innovative solution customized to your specific needs and goals. Compassionate and responsive, we will remain accessible throughout any legal proceedings to address your questions and concerns, and help you make the best informed decisions about the matters that affect your case.

To discuss your needs with a member of our dedicated legal team, you can take advantage of our law firm's free initial consultation by contacting the Chapdelaine Law Office and scheduling an appointment.
